entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
